name: Fay
description: A Support who wields an ancient gemstone that can enhance allies over a large area.

ultimate.name: Vibrant Dance
ultimate.description: Fay selects a direction and casts vitality magic to frontal allies within a 3-tile arc, restoring 300% of her ATK as HP and increasing their ATK by 12% for 8s.

upgrades.upgrade: The effect duration is increased to 9s.
Increases the ATK of allies within range by 14%.
Increases the ATK SPD of allies within range by 15.
The effect duration is increased to 10s.

skill_1.name: Healing Gemstones
skill_1.description: Fay heals the weakest allied hero, restoring 50% of her ATK as HP per second for 4s.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases HP restored per second to 55%.
Increases HP restored per second to 60%.
Increases HP restored per second to 65%.

skill_2.name: Blinding Light
skill_2.description: Fay smacks a gem at an enemy. She causes an explosion when the skill hits, dealing 150% damage to adjacent enemies and restoring 150% of her ATK as HP to all allies within range.

upgrades.upgrade: Increase damage to 155% and HP restored to 155%.

The gem has 2 forms and 2 different buffs. It becomes a ruby if the target deals physical damage, reducing enemies' Phys DEF by 10% and increasing allies' Phys DEF by 10% for 5s. It becomes a Sapphire if the target deals magic damage, reducing enemies' Magic DEF by 10% and increasing allies' Magic DEF by 10% for 5s.
Increase damage to 160% and HP restored to 160%.
Increases HP by 23% during battle.
Increases HP by 29% during battle.

ex_skill.name: Grand Entrance
ex_skill.description: Fay grants the buffs of Vibrant Dance and Healing Gemstones on the allied hero deployed on the tile in front of herself when a battle starts.

upgrades.upgrade: Also increases the allied hero's Vitality by 15 till the end of a battle.
Increases the allied hero's Vitality by 20.
Increases the allied hero's Vitality by 25.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: When an ally's HP ratio drops below 50% for the first time during Healing Gemstones takes effect, Fay heals the ally by 200% of her ATK as HP. This effect can only be triggered once each time this skill is used.

season_skill.name: Elusive Mirage
season_skill.description: After 5, 25, and 40 seconds into a battle, summons an untargetable illusion that casts the non-Ultimate skills in sequence, each with only 85% of the original Attack.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases ATK to 90% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 95% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 100% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 105% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 110% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 115% of its original value.
Increases ATK to 120% of its original value.
